title: Akali on howling abyss/in a bush
body: Can we talk about this for a second? You can't see her twilight shroud when she uses it in bush, I was training one of my friends against morgana stuns and the only way I knew he switched bushes was because I was suddenly being slowed. Shouldn't we be able to visually see the shroud because of the slow??

replies.body:
Nunu ult.

In a bush.

Since S1.
I think all/a lot of abilities are like that. Just yesterday I was hit over a wall by an invisible Kayne w.
tbh that doesnt really matter, she is getting rework possibly in next patch so
